subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=竹08}}

# [[zither]]

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text: * {{ja-r|古箏|こそう|[[guzheng]]}}

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|箏}} {{wp|Koto (musical instrument)}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|こと}} {{IPAfont|⟨ko2to2⟩}} → *{{IPAchar|/kətə/}} → {{IPAchar|/koto/}} From {{inh|ja|ojp|sort=こと|-}}, attested in the three major literature works of the {{w|Nara period}}: the ''{{w|Kojiki}}'' (712 {{CE}}), the ''{{w|Nihon Shoki}}'' (720 {{CE}}), and the ''{{w|Man'yōshū}}'' ({{circa2|759 {{CE}}|short=1}}). Possibly derived from a compound of elements {{compound|ja|木|tr1=ko|t1=[[tree]], [[wood]]|pos1=combining form|音|tr2=oto|t2=[[sound]]|nocat=1}}, with the additional medial ''o'' dropped by [[haplology]].

subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-l|筝}}
* {{s|Japanese zither}} {{ja-l|琴}}

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=k|こと|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{wp|lang=ja|古筝}} {{wp|Guzheng}}
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kanon|そう}} {{IPAchar|/sau/}} → {{IPAchar|/sɔː/}} → {{IPAchar|/soː/}} From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=そう|-}} {{ltc-l|箏}}. The ''{{ll|ja|漢音|kan'on}}'' reading, so likely the initial borrowing.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|y=ko|そう|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|しょう|hhira=しやう}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=しよう|possibly|_|obsolete}} a ''[[guzheng]]'', ''[[zheng]]'' {{gl|[[Chinese]] [[zither]]}}, where the ''[[koto]]'' was based on
